com.salimov.yurii.entity

Class Section

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salimov.yurii.entity.Model<E>
      • com.salimov.yurii.entity.Content<java.lang.Long>
        • com.salimov.yurii.entity.Section
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    @Entity
public final class Section
extends Content<java.lang.Long>
    The class implements a set of standard methods for working with entity of the Section class.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yurii Salimov (yurii.alex.salimov@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    Content, Model, Serialized Form

      • isValidated

        public static boolean isValidated(Section section)
        Statically validates the section. Section is valid if it is a valid content object and if it has at least one article.
        Parameters:
        section - a section to validate.
        Returns:
        true if the section are valid, false otherwise.
